products.title: Always Maxi Long Super Pads 90-count
products.body_html:
What are the differences between day and overnight pads?
Your body position and movements are different at night than they are during the day. AlwaysÂ® Overnight pads are designed with your different needs in mind. Designed with larger backsâ€”up to 2X larger*â€”these pads let you sleep easy, knowing that you're protected. Daytime pads are designed to fit and feel comfortable throughout the day.
*Vs. the Leading Regular Maxi pad.

Whatâ€™s the difference between Always Ultra Thin and Always Maxi?
Always Maxi Pads, in the blue package, provide the extra feeling of security many women get from using a thicker maxi pad. Always Ultra Thin pads, in the green package, are super thin and highly absorbent.

How do I put on a pad?
Always pads have adhesive strips to attach securely to your panties. Remove the paper backing and press the sticky side of the pad to your underwear. If your pad also has wings, remove the paper backing and wrap the wings around the underside of your panties.

When should I change my pad?
Youâ€™ll want to change your pad regularly to stay clean and comfortable, usually every 3â€“4 hours or more often if your flow is heavy.
  • Absorbency: Super
  • Brand: Always
  • Case Count: 90
  • Package Quantity (Count): 90

products.title: Barista Prima Colombia Coffee Carafe
products.body_html:
There is magic in the Andes. A potent energy that imbues the coffee nurtured there with near-mythic flavor. These highly prized Arabica beans, cultivated at high elevation on small farms shadowed by Colombia's majestic mountains, are a testament to the volcanic soils from which they sprung. Accented by wondrously bright, bold fruit notes and a distinctive hint of walnut, this deep-roasted cup possesses a sweet, full-bodied finish that perfectly reflects Colombia's proud coffee-growing tradition.

A K-CarafeÂ® pod brews up to 4 cups and is compatible with KeurigÂ® 2.0 Brewers.

Allow pod to cool. Carefully peel back tab to separate foil lid and any filter from cup. Recycle your cup wherever #5 plastics are accepted. #5 plastics may not be recyclable today in your community, so please check locally.

  1. Bright, bold fruit notes with a taste of walnut
  2. Dark Roast
  3. Caffeinated
  4. Orthodox Union Kosher

products.title: Barista Prima French Roast Coffee K Cups
products.body_html:
This intensely bold, elegantly-bodied cup provides indisputable proof of our roast masters' consummate artistry. Highest quality Arabica beans are guided to the very edge of noir - just beyond their second crack - then eased back, masterfully, to reveal their rich, full-flavored complexity. It's a delicate balancing act that demands beans of the utmost quality; high altitude Arabica capable of withstanding the intense heat demanded by this darker roast. Barista Prima CoffeehouseÂ® roast masters excel at carefully monitoring the tenuous balance between roast and flavor that results in a daringly dark, smoky-sweet brew with a surprisingly light mouthfeel. The ultimate proof? It's in your cup.

  • Daringly dark, smoky-sweet brew with a surprisingly light mouth feel
  • Dark Roast
  • Caffeinated
  • Orthodox Union Kosher
  • 24ct
